headline: IDEX (IEX): Evaluating Value Potential as Shares Rebound From Recent Lows
summary: IDEX (IEX) has seen its stock price move steadily over the past month, gaining about 4% despite some volatility in recent months. Investors continue to track its fundamentals for cues on where the stock could be heading next. See our latest analysis for IDEX. IDEX has managed to claw back some momentum lately, with a 4.2% 1-month share price return helping offset steeper declines earlier in the year. While the short-term uptrend is encouraging, the stock’s 1-year total shareholder return is...
